com.capgemini.cobigen.test.matchers

Class VariableAssignmentToMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<VariableAssignmentTo>
      • com.capgemini.cobigen.test.matchers.VariableAssignmentToMatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.hamcrest.Matcher<VariableAssignmentTo>, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing

    public class VariableAssignmentToMatcher
extends org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<VariableAssignmentTo>
    A hamcrest matcher for providing matching functionality for VariableAssignmentTos
    Author:
    mbrunnli (13.10.2014)
